scripts.setup: rimraf public/build && rimraf public/docs && rimraf deploy/public && npm-run-all --parallel symlink:* && npm-run-all --parallel glob:*
scripts.symlink:client: rimraf client/node_modules && mkdirp client/node_modules && cd client/node_modules && symlink ../component/ component && symlink ../lib/ lib  && symlink ../api/ api
scripts.symlink:server: rimraf server/node_modules && mkdirp server/node_modules && cd server/node_modules && symlink ../security security && symlink ../service service && symlink ../lib lib
scripts.postsetup: ncp node_modules/swagger-ui-dist public/docs && cd deploy && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.deploy: echo "deploying stage $STAGE now" && cd deploy && serverless deploy --stage=$STAGE
scripts.dev: export DEVELOPMENT=true && npm-run-all --parallel watch:js watch:glob-client-routes watch:glob-server-routes watch:glob-server-models
scripts.watch:glob-server-routes: watch 'npm run glob:server-routes && node generate-openapi.js' server/route
scripts.watch:glob-server-models: watch 'npm run glob:server-models && node generate-openapi.js' server/lib/model
